name: keepassxc
tagline: A cross-platform password manager with encrypted local databases
description: KeePassXC is a cross platform password manager that stores credentials in encrypted local databases. It supports browser integration, auto typing, hardware keys and syncing via self chosen storage, giving users full control over their secrets.

features.title: Password Management
features.description: Store and manage passwords in encrypted vaults

features.title: Cross-Platform Client
features.description: Use the application on major desktop operating systems

features.title: Password Generation
features.description: Generate passwords based on configurable rules

features.title: Browser Integration
features.description: Autofill credentials in supported web browsers
